title: What Makes Scorpio the Most Attractive Sign in the Zodiac?

steps.title: Because Scorpios are enigmas, you’ll be desperate to learn more.
steps.content: Because Scorpios are enigmas, you’ll be desperate to learn more. This sign is secretive, complex, and in some ways, hard to get to know. They keep their cards close to their chest, and in love, that makes them totally fascinating. Scorpios invented “leave them wanting more.” So if you’ve got a crush on this sign, prepare for some sleepless nights ( What are they thinking? Are they thinking of me? ). [1] X Research source Scorpio moon might be the most mysterious placement in the Zodiac, which gives them a fascinating, intoxicating appeal. If you're crushing on one, they'll definitely keep you guessing!

steps.title: Scorpio's desire for deep intimacy creates an earth-shattering allure.
steps.content: Scorpio's desire for deep intimacy creates an earth-shattering allure. This sign seeks depth in everything. And that includes love and romance, too! Part of what makes Scorpios so irresistible is the intensity they bring to every interaction. They know how to create a serious connection—so when you meet a Scorpio, you might feel things you’ve never felt before (and no surprise, this makes them super attractive!).

steps.title: Scorpio's can-do attitude and confidence is inspiring (and attractive).
steps.content: Scorpio's can-do attitude and confidence is inspiring (and attractive). Scorpios aren’t happy with good enough—they crave power, success, and personal growth. Hard work and focus can be super attractive qualities in a person, so you might find that your Scorpio crush’s iron will and laser focus make them that much more appealing to you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Scorpios are perceptive, clever conversationalists with great banter.
steps.content: Scorpios are perceptive, clever conversationalists with great banter. As a water sign, Scorpios are totally emotionally intelligent. [3] X Research source Plus, this sign is known for having a sharp wit. You might find that your Scorpio crush’s intellect is your favorite thing about them, and that you crave their conversation. Over time, you might find Scorpio hard to resist.

steps.title: Scorpio's natural, sexual energy will leave you feeling flushed.
steps.content: Scorpio's natural, sexual energy will leave you feeling flushed. It’s a well-recorded fact: Scorpios are the best sign in bed. They’re adventurous, generous, and totally life-altering; so if you’re into a Scorpio placement, you might be picking up on their major sexual energy. Scorpio is known for being sexually compatible with basically every sign, so no matter who you are, it makes sense if you're forming a crush on this sensual sign.

steps.title: Scorpio's enigmatic, complicated nature draws others in automatically.
steps.content: Scorpio's enigmatic, complicated nature draws others in automatically. Scorpios get that there’s always more than meets the eye, and for the most part, they have a super unique view of the world. Talking with Scorpio about their favorite movies, poetry, and conspiracy theories, you’ll realize that they’re super thoughtful, which might leave you desperate to learn more. Reader Poll: We asked 610 wikiHow readers who've dated Scorpios, and only 7% of them agreed that the best way to attract them is by being intelligent and analytical. [Take Poll] So while Scorpios may be deep, you don’t have to be an expert on a bunch of complex topics to have a good conversation with them.

steps.title: When you realize that Scorpio really gets you, you'll probably swoon.
steps.content: When you realize that Scorpio really gets you, you'll probably swoon. This sign is clever, observant and super intuitive—they might seem to get you in a way that other people don’t. Scorpios are the kind of people who give amazing book and music recs, and who know exactly what to say to make someone feel better. So if you’re stuck on Scorpio, this might be why.

steps.title: Because Scorpios are super strategic, they're also great flirters.
steps.content: Because Scorpios are super strategic, they're also great flirters. In love and romance, Scorpio knows exactly what they want, and they know how to get it, too. [4] X Research source When Scorpio has a crush , they’ll ask all the right questions, choose all the right dates, and know the perfect moment to brush your hair from your face. Scorpio will make you feel like you’re in a movie—and this makes them even more attractive.

steps.title: Scorpio can make you feel like the only other person in the world.
steps.content: Scorpio can make you feel like the only other person in the world. Scorpio is all about intensity, focus, and depth. So when you two are in conversation, their eyes won’t wander to other corners of the room. They’ll want to know everything about you, and they’ll probably hang on your every word. This kind of attention can be enticing, so this might be how Scorpio captures your heart.

steps.title: A Scorpio's gorgeous, mesmerizing stare makes you feel truly seen.
steps.content: A Scorpio's gorgeous, mesmerizing stare makes you feel truly seen. They say that eyes are the window the soul, and Scorpios are so deep, you might just fall right in. This sign is famous for long, lingering eye contact—the kind that you might find impossible to break. Their gaze might make you feel all the feels (which, of course, is exactly what Scorpio wants!).

steps.title: Scorpio is always dressed to impress, and they definitely turn heads.
steps.content: Scorpio is always dressed to impress, and they definitely turn heads. Though Scorpio’s style might vary from person to person, you can trust that this sign will always look fresh, unique, and totally cool. Great clothes can be attractive to anyone, so if this sign has caught your eye, that could definitely be why. And here’s a pro tip: to make the feeling mutual , you should compliment Scorpio’s fit—they’ll probably swoon! The classic Scorpio style is especially obvious with Scorpio rising's. If you're crushing on one, expect to be floored by some fabulous outfits.

steps.title: Scorpio pushes boundaries, leaving others on the edge of their seat.
steps.content: Scorpio pushes boundaries, leaving others on the edge of their seat. Though Scorpio isn't a fire sign, their quest for depth can make them pretty spontaneous and unexpected. In romance, this is especially true. Partners might find it hard to predict their next question or their next big idea. Random drives to the middle of nowhere for a night of stargazing, for example, is classic Scorpio.
